23 template <typename T>
24 using void_t = void;
25 
26 template <typename T, typename = void>
27 struct has_initialize_children : std::false_type
28 {};
29 
30 template <typename T>
31 struct has_initialize_children<T, void_t<decltype(&T::initializeChildren)>> : std::true_type
32 {};
33 
34 template <typename T>
35 void initializeChildren(std::true_type, T& object)
36 {
37  object.initializeChildren();
38 }
39 
40 template <typename T>
41 void initializeChildren(std::false_type, T&)
42 {}
43 
44 template <typename T>
45 void initializeChildren(T& object)
46 {
47  initializeChildren(has_initialize_children<T>(), object);
48 }
49 
50 } // namespace detail

62 template <typename T, typename ALLOC = std::allocator<uint8_t>,
63  typename std::enable_if<!std::is_enum<T>::value, int>::type = 0>
64 BasicBitBuffer<ALLOC> serialize(T& object, const ALLOC& allocator = ALLOC())
65 {
66  detail::initializeChildren(object);
67  BasicBitBuffer<ALLOC> bitBuffer(object.initializeOffsets(0), allocator);
68  BitStreamWriter writer(bitBuffer);
69  object.write(writer, PreWriteAction::NO_PRE_WRITE_ACTION);
70  return bitBuffer;
71 }
72 
83 template <typename T, typename ALLOC = std::allocator<uint8_t>,
84  typename std::enable_if<std::is_enum<T>::value, int>::type = 0>
85 BasicBitBuffer<ALLOC> serialize(T enumValue, const ALLOC& allocator = ALLOC())
86 {
87  BasicBitBuffer<ALLOC> bitBuffer(zserio::bitSizeOf(enumValue), allocator);
88  BitStreamWriter writer(bitBuffer);
89  zserio::write(writer, enumValue);
90  return bitBuffer;
91 }
92 
103 template <typename T, typename ALLOC, typename ...ARGS>
104 typename std::enable_if<!std::is_enum<T>::value, T>::type deserialize(
105  const BasicBitBuffer<ALLOC>& bitBuffer, ARGS&&... arguments)
106 {
107  BitStreamReader reader(bitBuffer);
108  return T(reader, std::forward<ARGS>(arguments)...);
109 }
110 
120 template <typename T, typename ALLOC>
121 typename std::enable_if<std::is_enum<T>::value, T>::type deserialize(const BasicBitBuffer<ALLOC>& bitBuffer)
122 {
123  BitStreamReader reader(bitBuffer);
124  return zserio::read<T>(reader);
125 }
126 
135 template <typename T>
136 void serializeToFile(T& object, const std::string& fileName)
137 {
138  const BitBuffer bitBuffer = serialize(object);
139  writeBufferToFile(bitBuffer, fileName);
140 }
141 
152 template <typename T, typename ...ARGS>
153 T deserializeFromFile(const std::string& fileName, ARGS&&... arguments)
154 {
155  const BitBuffer bitBuffer = readBufferFromFile(fileName);
156  return deserialize<T>(bitBuffer, std::forward<ARGS>(arguments)...);
157 }
